alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 3:53PM CDT until May 18 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Crockett County in west central Texas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2083 And Highway 405, or 13 miles east of Terrell County Gas Plant, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Crockett County, including the following locations... The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2083 And Highway 405. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
